byline.contributor: Patrick Healy contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and JONATHAN MARTIN

abstract: Jeb Bush formally declares his candidacy in 2016 presidential race; argues he is most experienced candidate in field and refuting fears that he represents another figure in political dynasty.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bush declared he was running for president, and called upon his own record of ambitious, conservative-minded change as Florida’s chief executive.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Announces White House Bid, Saying ‘America Deserves Better’
headline.print_headline: Joining Race, Jeb Bush Leans on His Record

snippet: Mr. Bush declared he was running for president, and called upon his own record of ambitious, conservative-minded change as Florida’s chief executive.
